title: Nasus ult bug
body: I was just playing nasus with a friend on a smurf, custom game. And I ulted just as my ult came back off of CD but it was too late and I died . RIPerino, anyways I heard the ult sound but it didnt activate. Then as soon as I spawned it went off. This would suck if it was in a real game, Pls fixerino.
